Drinks.Title: Brandy
Drinks.Description: Typically made from grapes, but can be made with other fruits.

Drinks.Title: Vermouth
Drinks.Description: Vermouth is a fortified and aromatized wine.

Drinks.Title: Cognac
Drinks.Description: Cognac is a specific type of brandy produced from distilled white wine.

Drinks.Title: Beer
Drinks.Description: Beer is an alcoholic beverage produced by extracting raw materials with water, boiling (usually with hops), and fermenting

Drinks.Title: Port wine
Drinks.Description: Port is a sweet, red, fortified wine from Portugal.

Drinks.Title: Rum
Drinks.Description: Rum is a liquor made by fermenting then distilling sugarcane molasses or sugarcane juice.
